data.message: This is a cry for help. I am trying to get my wife's medical condition broadcasted on a network. My wife has stage 3 Supprativia Hidradenitis a skin condition that has no known cure. Am i praying for a a network to broadcast her condition in a hope that other people with the condition can speak out about treatments or medical miracles that worked. My daughter Aaliyah and I watch my wife day in and day out go through serious pain. Please dont ignore me. Please contact me and give my wife hope. My phone number is 330-614-5593. My name is Joshua Cross. My address is 2115 Goodyear Blvd. Akron, Ohio 44305. Her parents are Religous Community Family Members of a local Church we pray every week for a miracle. Please be that miracle. God Bless
